label: Eyewear and Contact Lenses
description: Market category for designer glasses, contact lenses, and related eye care products.
intents: Correct vision with prescription glasses or contact lenses
Get contact lenses delivered to my door
Treat eye infections and dry eyes
Shop for Halloween or novelty contact lenses

subcategories.label: Prescription Glasses
subcategories.description: Designer and affordable prescription glasses for men, women, and children.

subcategories.label: Contact Lenses
subcategories.description: Disposable and colored contact lenses for daily or occasional use.

subcategories.label: Designer Glasses
subcategories.description: High-end designer glasses and frames for fashion-conscious customers.

subcategories.label: Sunglasses
subcategories.description: Prescription and non-prescription sunglasses for UV protection and style.

subcategories.label: Eye Care Products
subcategories.description: Eye drops, ointments, and solutions for dry eyes, infections, and other eye conditions.
